lyric:
[by:Fernando-Ramirez]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Robin Fredriksson/Mattias Larsson/Justin Tranter/Daniel Platzman
[00:01.000] 作词 : Dan Reynolds/Wayne Sermon/Ben McKee/Robin Fredriksson/Mattias Larsson/Justin Tranter/Daniel Platzman
[00:09.600]Well, you hold the line
[00:11.900]When every one of them is giving up or giving in, tell me
[00:14.800]In this house of mine
[00:16.500]Nothing ever comes without a consequence or cost, tell me
[00:19.600]Will the stars align?
[00:21.400]Will heaven step in? Will it save us from our sin? Will it?
[00:24.500]'Cause this house of mine stands strong
[00:27.000]That's the price you pay
[00:30.400]Leave behind your heartache, cast away
[00:35.900]Just another product of today
[00:40.800]Rather be the hunter than the prey
[00:45.100]And you're standing on the edge,
[00:46.500]Face up 'cause you're a
[00:47.800]Natural
[00:49.500]A beating heart of stone
[00:51.800]You gotta be so cold
[00:54.300]To make it in this world
[00:56.900]Yeah, you're a natural
[00:59.000]Living your life cutthroat
[01:01.300]You gotta be so cold
[01:03.900]Yeah, you're a natural
[01:07.100]Will somebody
[01:09.000]Let me see the light within the dark trees' shadows and
[01:12.500]What's happenin'?
[01:14.000]Lookin' through the glass find the wrongWithin the past knowin'
[01:16.800]Oh, we are the youth
[01:18.900]Call out to the beast,Not a word without the peace, facing
[01:21.800]A bit of the truth, the truth
[01:24.500]That's the price you pay
[01:28.800]Leave behind your heartache, cast away
[01:33.000]Just another product of today
[01:38.600]Rather be the hunter than the prey
[01:42.900]And you're standing on the edge,
[01:43.860]Face up 'cause you're a
[01:45.710]Natural
[01:47.000]A beating heart of stone
[01:49.700]You gotta be so cold
[01:41.900]To make it in this world
[01:54.200]Yeah, you're a natural
[01:46.800]Living your life cutthroat
[01:59.000]You gotta be so cold
[02:01.900]Yeah, you're a natural
[02:05.000]Deep inside me, I'm fading to black, I'm fading
[02:10.000]Took an oath by the blood of my hand, won't break it
[02:15.000]I can taste it, the end is upon us, I swear
[02:19.800]Gonna make it
[02:21.700]I'm gonna make it
[02:26.500]Natural
[02:27.800]A beating heart of stone
[02:30.000]You gotta be so cold
[02:32.700]To make it in this world
[02:35.300]Yeah, you're a natural
[02:37.600]Living your life cutthroat
[02:39.800]You gotta be so cold
[02:42.500]Yeah, you're a natural
[02:52.500]Natural
[03:01.000]Yeah, you're a natural
tlyric:
[by:SChariskP]
[00:09.600]好吧，你守住了底线
[00:11.900]当所有人都放弃或屈服后，再告诉我
[00:14.800]这是在我的空间
[00:16.500]百因必有果，不是吗
[00:19.600]群星会对齐吗？
[00:21.400]我们会升入天堂吗？祂会饶恕我们的罪行吗？会吗？
[00:24.500]因为我的空间屹立不倒
[00:27.000]这就是你要付出的代价
[00:30.400]忘记痛苦，随波逐流
[00:35.900]只不过是今天的另一个成果罢了
[00:40.800]不是猎杀，就是被猎杀
[00:45.100]而你正徘徊在边缘
[00:46.500]抬起头来只因你——
[00:47.800]天性使然
[00:49.500]有力的心跳
[00:51.800]你只有变得冷酷无情
[00:54.300]才能在这个世界上占据一席之地
[00:56.900]本该如此
[00:59.000]过着残酷的生活
[01:01.300]你必须变得冷血无情
[01:03.900]就该如此
[01:07.100]会有这样的人吗
[01:09.000]让我透过树荫瞥见光明
[01:12.500]到底发生了什么？
[01:14.000]透过玻璃屏，发掘过去犯下的错误
[01:16.800]没错，我们正年轻气盛
[01:18.900]打破囚笼，无需多说，只需面对
[01:21.800]真相的一角
[01:24.500]这便是你要付出的代价
[01:28.800]忘掉烦恼，抛之脑后
[01:33.000]仅仅是今天的另一个成果罢了
[01:38.600]杀戮，或者被杀
[01:41.900]仅为了在这个世界活下去
[01:42.900]而你正站在边缘仰起头只因
[01:43.860]仰起头只因
[01:45.710]本该如此
[01:46.800]艰难度日
[01:47.000]如磐石般坚毅的心跳
[01:49.700]你唯有变得绝情
[01:54.200]这样就对了
[01:59.000]你开始变得不留仁慈
[02:01.900]这就是你的天性
[02:05.000]我的灵魂正在由内而外一点一点崩塌
[02:10.000]我立下血誓，绝不会打破它
[02:15.000]我能感觉到，我们手握大局，我发誓
[02:19.800]会成功的
[02:21.700]我会不顾一切让这实现
[02:26.500]这是我的天性
[02:27.800]心跳坚定
[02:30.000]你只有变得冷血
[02:32.700]才能存活在这个世界上
[02:35.300]这就是天性
[02:37.600]历经艰难
[02:39.800]你才会变得坚毅
[02:42.500]就该这样
[02:52.500]遵从天性
[03:01.000]这就是你的天性
